languages.text: "Внутренние распри и затаившиеся враги лишили меня дома". {n}Голос девушки подрагивает, пусть Леди-Навигатор и старается это скрыть.{/n} "Если этот ритуал может обнаружить угрозу — лучше смириться с неизбежными жертвами и действовать, чем потерять все".

"Internal strife and lurking enemies stole my home from me." {n}Despite her efforts to hide it, you notice a slight tremble in the Lady Navigator's voice.{/n} "If that ritual can uncover the threat, then we must act on it. Better to accept the imminent casualties as a necessary sacrifice than to lose everything altogether."
languages.original_text: "Внутренние распри и затаившиеся враги лишили меня дома". {n}Голос девушки подрагивает, пусть Леди-Навигатор и старается это скрыть.{/n} "Если этот ритуал может обнаружить угрозу — лучше смириться с неизбежными жертвами и действовать, чем потерять все".

traits.locale_text: "Internal strife and lurking enemies stole my home from me." {n}The Lady Navigator's voice trembles a little despite her efforts to hide it.{/n} "If that ritual can uncover the threat, then we must act. Better to accept the imminent casualties as a necessary sacrifice than to lose everything."

Better to accept the imminent casualties as a necessary sacrifice than to lose everything altogether."

languages.text: 「内部の争いや潜む敵によって、私の家を奪われてしまいました」 {n}必死に隠そうとしているものの、カシアの声にはわずかに震えが混じっている。{/n} 「もし儀式で脅威を明らかにできるのなら、私たちは行動しなければなりません。差し迫った犠牲も、すべてを失うよりは必要なものとして受け入れるべきですわ」
languages.original_text: "Internal strife and lurking enemies stole my home from me." {n}Despite her efforts to hide it, you notice a slight tremble in the Lady Navigator's voice.{/n} "If that ritual can uncover the threat, then we must act on it. Better to accept the imminent casualties as a necessary sacrifice than to lose everything altogether."

traits.locale_text: 「内部の争いや潜む敵によって、私の家を奪われてしまいました」 {n}必死に隠そうとしているものの、カシアの声にはわずかに震えが混じっている。{/n} 「もし儀式で脅威を明らかにできるのなら、私たちは行動しなければなりません。差し迫った犠牲も、すべてを失うよりは必要なものとして受け入れるべきですわ」

languages.text: «Las disputas internas y los enemigos ocultos me arrebataron mi hogar». {n}Aunque intenta ocultarlo, notas un leve temblor en la voz de la Lady Navegante.{/n} «Si ese ritual puede descubrir la amenaza, debemos actuar. Es mejor aceptar las bajas resultantes como sacrificio necesario en vez de perderlo todo».
languages.original_text: "Internal strife and lurking enemies stole my home from me." {n}Despite her efforts to hide it, you notice a slight tremble in the Lady Navigator's voice.{/n} "If that ritual can uncover the threat, then we must act on it. Better to accept the imminent casualties as a necessary sacrifice than to lose everything altogether."

traits.locale_text: «Las disputas internas y los enemigos ocultos me arrebataron mi hogar». {n}Aunque intenta ocultarlo, notas un leve temblor en la voz de la Lady Navegante.{/n} «Si ese ritual puede descubrir la amenaza, debemos actuar. Es mejor aceptar las bajas resultantes como sacrificio necesario en vez de perderlo todo».

languages.text: « Les luttes intestines et les ennemis aux aguets m'ont privée de mon foyer. » {n}Vous remarquez un léger tremblement dans la voix de la navigatrice bien qu'elle s'efforce de le cacher.{/n} « Si ce rituel peut révéler la menace, alors nous devons agir. Mieux vaut accepter le sacrifice de quelques victimes aujourd'hui que tout perdre demain. »
languages.original_text: "Internal strife and lurking enemies stole my home from me." {n}Despite her efforts to hide it, you notice a slight tremble in the Lady Navigator's voice.{/n} "If that ritual can uncover the threat, then we must act on it. Better to accept the imminent casualties as a necessary sacrifice than to lose everything altogether."

traits.locale_text: « Les luttes intestines et les ennemis aux aguets m'ont privée de mon foyer. » {n}Vous remarquez un léger tremblement dans la voix de la navigatrice bien qu'elle s'efforce de le cacher.{/n} « Si ce rituel peut révéler la menace, alors nous devons agir. Mieux vaut accepter le sacrifice de quelques victimes aujourd'hui que tout perdre demain. »

languages.text: “我的家园就毁在了内部争斗与潜伏的敌人手中。”{n}尽管卡西娅极力克制着自己的情感，但你仍然注意到她的声音微微颤抖。{/n}“如果这样的仪式可以发现威胁，那我们必须采取行动。接受必要的伤亡与牺牲，总比彻底失去一切要好。”
languages.original_text: "Internal strife and lurking enemies stole my home from me." {n}Despite her efforts to hide it, you notice a slight tremble in the Lady Navigator's voice.{/n} "If that ritual can uncover the threat, then we must act on it. Better to accept the imminent casualties as a necessary sacrifice than to lose everything altogether."

traits.locale_text: “我的家园就毁在了内部争斗与潜伏的敌人手中。”{n}尽管卡西娅极力克制着自己的情感，但你仍然注意到她的声音微微颤抖。{/n}“如果这样的仪式可以发现威胁，那我们必须采取行动。接受必要的伤亡与牺牲，总比彻底失去一切要好。”

languages.text: "Innere Konflikte und lauernde Feinde haben mir die Heimat geraubt." {n}Trotz ihrer Bemühungen, es zu verbergen, bemerkst du ein leichtes Zittern in der Stimme der Lady Navigator.{/n} "Wenn das Ritual die Bedrohung offenbaren kann, müssen wir es ausführen. Es ist besser, sofortige Verluste als notwendiges Opfer zu akzeptieren, als alles zu verlieren."
languages.original_text: "Internal strife and lurking enemies stole my home from me." {n}Despite her efforts to hide it, you notice a slight tremble in the Lady Navigator's voice.{/n} "If that ritual can uncover the threat, then we must act on it. Better to accept the imminent casualties as a necessary sacrifice than to lose everything altogether."

traits.locale_text: "Innere Konflikte und lauernde Feinde haben mir die Heimat geraubt." {n}Trotz ihrer Bemühungen, es zu verbergen, bemerkst du ein leichtes Zittern in der Stimme der Lady Navigator.{/n} "Wenn das Ritual die Bedrohung offenbaren kann, müssen wir es ausführen. Es ist besser, sofortige Verluste als notwendiges Opfer zu akzeptieren, als alles zu verlieren."

languages.text: "İç çekişmeler ve pusuya yatmış düşmanlar yuvamı benden çaldı." {n}Saklamaya çalışsa da Leydi Rotacı'nın sesindeki o hafif titreme gözünden kaçmıyor.{/n} "O ayin bu tehdidi açığa çıkaracaksa derhâl harekete geçmeliyiz. Yaklaşan kayıpları mecburi bir fedakârlık olarak görmek, her şeyi kaybetmekten evladır."
languages.original_text: "Internal strife and lurking enemies stole my home from me." {n}Despite her efforts to hide it, you notice a slight tremble in the Lady Navigator's voice.{/n} "If that ritual can uncover the threat, then we must act on it. Better to accept the imminent casualties as a necessary sacrifice than to lose everything altogether."

Yaklaşan kayıpları mecburi bir fedakârlık olarak görmek, her şeyi kaybetmekten evladır."
